titleStmt.title: The weather-cocke of Romes religion: with her seuerall changes. Or: The world turn'd topsie-turuie by papists
titleStmt.author: Cooke, Alexander, 1564-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Purslow for Iohn Marriot, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstanes Churchyard in Fleet-streete,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The Roman weather-cocke.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Saint Dunstanes Churchyard in Fleet-streete
